title: Eco-friendly drywall
description: Kevin Surace suggests we rethink basic construction materials -- such as the familiar wallboard -- to reduce the huge carbon footprint generated by the manufacturing and construction of our buildings. He introduces EcoRock, a clean, recyclable and energy-efficient drywall created by his team at Serious Materials.
author: Kevin Surace
keywords: TED, talks, architecture, business, demo, design, green, invention, technology
